definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: I next attempted to hide the pill in some tuna. Albacore , actually.
sentences.chinese: 接着我又将药片藏在金枪鱼里，其实是青花鱼。

sentences.english: As soon as a tuna is sold at auction, it is hauled off to the buyer's stall by cart.
sentences.chinese: 一旦金枪鱼拍卖成功，就会由卡车运送到买家的货摊。

sentences.english: Atlantic Ocean catches consist mostly of yellowfin.
sentences.chinese: 大西洋所渔获的也基本上是黄鳍金枪鱼。

sentences.english: One day she gave him a bite of tuna.
sentences.chinese: 一天，她给他吃了一口金枪鱼。

sentences.english: Take maguro, the tuna whose sashimi is most recognizable to Americans.
sentences.chinese: 就拿美国人最熟悉的金枪鱼来说吧。

sentences.english: Kumamoto oyster, Fine Claire oyster, chu-toro, tuna & salmon sashimi.
sentences.chinese: 日本熊本生蚝，法国芬得克雷尔生蚝，金枪鱼腩。

sentences.english: Tavira used to be a place devoted to the tuna fishing.
sentences.chinese: 塔维拉曾经就是以金枪鱼捕捞业而繁盛一时的地区。

sentences.english: A small one took the hook on his stern line.
sentences.chinese: 一条小金枪鱼咬住了他艉缆上的鱼钩。

sentences.english: These species consist of the so-called principal market tunas and some billfishes.
sentences.chinese: 这些品种包括所谓的主要市场金枪鱼和一些旗鱼。

sentences.english: StarKist wants tunas that taste good.
sentences.chinese: 星基斯特想要味道不错的金枪鱼。

sentences.english: The body shapes of tunas, in fact, are nearly ideal from an engineering point of view.
sentences.chinese: 从工程师的角度来看，金枪鱼的体型近乎完美。

sentences.english: In fact, tunas must swim to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，金枪鱼必须靠游动才能呼吸。

sentences.english: Inside the small boat were several large yellowfin tuna.
sentences.chinese: 在小船被几家大型黄鳍金枪鱼。

sentences.english: The evening feast included diced fatty flesh of tuna fish and milk-fed lamb with herbs.
sentences.chinese: 日本提供的菜单显示，晚宴包括金枪鱼和香薰乳羊。

sentences.english: I'd like to order two tuna sandwiches and a large pot of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我想要两份金枪鱼三明治和一年夜壶咖啡。
